Detailed Description

Container class which can store statistics objects for all existing front-ends.

The statistics collected from all front-ends can be printed to an output stream. This class should not be used directly but the template FeStatList_t which gives You type safety.

void FeStatListBase_t::show ( const char *  label  ) 

Print statistics about all front-ends.

Parameters:
label text to be printed as a header line. The output depends on the statistics objects used. NOTE: This method will call the method StatObj_t::finish i.e. the objects should not be changed afterwords otherwise the result will rather undefined.
